name: Garden Battle Stars - Shooter
description:
Take on the role of a mutant insect exterminator.

Choose a star hero, upgrade your character, pick up unique weapons and exterminate all the insects in the garden.

In Garden Battle Stars, insects can be crushed with plasma weapons!

The game takes place in a fictional world where you take on the role of one of the heroes of the battle star mercenary - insect exterminator armed with one of the many weapons. Mutant insects are destroying food on farms around the world. The fate of mankind is in your hands!

- Shoot the mutant insects.

- Free up territory after territory.

- Earn points and upgrade your character.

- Unite with your friends and create fireteams.



Please pay attention to my projects - I'm an indie developer.
